description: Detects LSASS process access by pypykatz for credential dumping.
name: Credential Dumping by Pypykatz
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetImage:*\\lsass.exe AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*C\:\\Windows\\SYSTEM32\\ntdll.dll\+* AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*C\:\\Windows\\System32\\KERNELBASE.dll\+* AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*libffi\-7.dll* AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*_ctypes.pyd\+* AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*python3*.dll\+* AND winlog.event_data.GrantedAccess:"0x1FFFFF")
author: Bhabesh Raj
